The Abominable Showman. The Great Befriender. The Morale Crusader. Nothing If Not Derivative. 🌱. He/him.

I used to be an amazing singer/songwriter. Now I'm an amazing mid-level software engineer. I teach German at community college and I'm trying hard to do both jobs as well as can be imagined. I also get more credit than I deserve as a public speaker.

I love generously but I flame arseholes, to my eternal regret.

note:
Hi, I'm here to keep Mastodon a beautiful place. I post an excerpt of #medieval #bookIllumination 🏰📖 every day at 7 AM CET, showcasing the intricate artistry of the #MiddleAges.

We explore the fascinating world of medieval art, where hidden humor🐒, stunning visuals 👹, and rich history 🪽 come together to challenge misconceptions. Let's appreciate the vibrant world of medieval manuscripts and discover how the Middle Ages were far from dark.

#medievalillumination #MedievalArt 🎭🖼️

note:
Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
